comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/paulgureghian>@paulgureghian</denchmark-link>
Thank you for the issue. Would you please check what is the latest tensorflow version possible on pipenv? Thanks
I tried to find that out by looking at the pipenv docs, but I couldn't figure it out.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
